summary: This is an email correspondence dated October 27, 2020, regarding a discovery letter draft in the Epstein case. It involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York discussing edits and an upcoming call with someone named Richards.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working on a discovery letter draft for the Epstein case, requesting discussion of remaining comments and mentioning a call with Richards.

persons.name: Richards
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the Assistant United States Attorney plans to have a call with, likely involved in the case discussions.

connections.description: Planning to have a call together regarding the Epstein case discovery letter.

events.title: Discovery Letter Draft Discussion
events.description: Email correspondence about reviewing comments/edits on a discovery letter draft and planning a call to discuss remaining comments.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 27, 2020, related to the Epstein case discovery process.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is working on a discovery letter draft.
The email mentions a planned call with someone named Richards to discuss remaining comments on the draft.
